And <S%G3956>everyone<s%> who <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> [fixed] on Him <S%G48>purifies<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He is <S%G53>pure.<s%>
<S%G3956>Everyone<s%> who <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G458>lawlessness;<s%> and <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G458>lawlessness.<s%>

<S%G3956>No<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> who <S%G3306>abides<s%> in Him <S%G264>sins;<s%> <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> who <S%G264>sins<s%> has <S%G3708>seen<s%> Him <S%G3761>or<s%> <S%G1097>knows<s%> Him.

<S%G5040>Little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> let <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G4105>deceive<s%> you; the one who <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He is <S%G1342>righteous;<s%>

the one who <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> is of the <S%G1228>devil;<s%> for the <S%G1228>devil<s%> has <S%G264>sinned<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning.<s%> The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5319>appeared<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> purpose, that He might <S%G3089>destroy<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G3956>No<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956>one<s%> who is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G4160>practices<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> His <S%G4690>seed<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in him; and he <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he is <S%G1080>born<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

By <S%G3778>this<s%> the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> and the <S%G5043>children<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil<s%> are <S%G5318>obvious:<s%> <S%G3956>anyone<s%> who does not <S%G4160>practice<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> is not of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>nor<s%> the one who does not <S%G25>love<s%> his <S%G80>brother.<s%>
For <S%G3778>this<s%> is the <S%G31>message<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> from the <S%G746>beginning,<s%> that we should <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%>

not as <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> [who] was of the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4190>one,<s%> and <S%G4969>slew<s%> his <S%G80>brother.<s%> And for <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5484>reason<s%> did he <S%G4969>slay<s%> him? <S%G3754>Because<s%> his <S%G2041>deeds<s%> were <S%G4190>evil,<s%> and his brother's were <S%G1342>righteous.<s%>
Do not <S%G2296>marvel,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> <S%G3404>hates<s%> you.

We <S%G3609>know<s%> that we have <S%G3327>passed<s%> out of <S%G2288>death<s%> into <S%G2222>life,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G25>love<s%> the <S%G80>brethren.<s%> He who does not <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G3956>Everyone<s%> who <S%G3404>hates<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> is a <S%G443>murderer;<s%> and you <S%G3609>know<s%> that <S%G3956>no<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G443>murderer<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G3306>abiding<s%> in him.

We <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> by <S%G3778>this,<s%> that He <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> His <S%G5590>life<s%> for us; and we <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> our <S%G5590>lives<s%> for the <S%G80>brethren.<s%>

But <S%G3739>whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the world's <S%G979>goods,<s%> and <S%G2334>beholds<s%> his <S%G80>brother<s%> in <S%G5532>need<s%> and <S%G2808>closes<s%> his <S%G4698>heart<s%> <S%G575>against<s%> him, <S%G4459>how<s%> does the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3306>abide<s%> in him?

We shall <S%G1097>know<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> that we are of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> and shall <S%G3982>assure<s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1715>before<s%> Him,

in <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1437><s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G2607>condemns<s%> us; for <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3173>greater<s%> than our <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G1097>knows<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things.<s%>
<S%G27>Beloved,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> our <S%G2588>heart<s%> does not <S%G2607>condemn<s%> us, we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>confidence<s%> <S%G4314>before<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

and <S%G3739>whatever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> we <S%G154>ask<s%> we <S%G2983>receive<s%> from Him, <S%G3754>because<s%> we <S%G5083>keep<s%> His <S%G1785>commandments<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> the things that are <S%G701>pleasing<s%> in His <S%G1799>sight.<s%>

And <S%G3778>this<s%> is His <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> that we <S%G4100>believe<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of His <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as He <S%G1325>commanded<s%> <S%G1785><s%> us.

And the one who <S%G5083>keeps<s%> His <S%G1785>commandments<s%> <S%G3306>abides<s%> in Him, and He in him. And we <S%G1097>know<s%> by <S%G3778>this<s%> that He <S%G3306>abides<s%> in us, by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> He has <S%G1325>given<s%> us.
